content: hook *work 3 double_crochet in same single_crochet* repeat twice work 2 double_crochet in each chain around until you get to the last three chain s *work 3 double_crochet* in each bind off leaving a long tail place ruffle around neck of doll centering the open ends in the front to complete this part i stitched both ends together with a tapestry needle then eye-balled where it looked like it should sit then used the long tail to sew the end to the chest then stitched it up around the neck using the front loops that were left unworked earlier **see pics below** headband row instructions stitches 1 chain 23 connect to beginning chain and single_crochet in each around being 23 careful not to twist the work 2 single_crochet in each around 23 3 repeat row 2 23 *bind off leave a long tail * go ahead and put the headband on the head you know you want to  page 4 of 10 copyright sherri bush ~ sherri crochets & crafts http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush contact me at sherricrochets@gmail com the hair i wrapped the brown yarn around my crochet hook case see pics below a whole bunch of times and then cut it in half i then placed the headband so i could see where i needed the hair to go next i stuck a small crochet hook size d though a single_crochet stitch wrapped a piece of the brown yarn around the hook pulled it through part way then knotted the yarn see pics below i kept placing the headband so i could see where all the hair on top of his head needed to go once i had the top of the head filled in i sewed the headband into place using the long tail i had left then i filled in some of the head below the headband so it looked like he had a full head of hair trim the hair in back so it looks nice add some beads to a few strands and tie knots in the end so the beads don t fall off the arms make 2 row instructions stitches 1 **starting from hand using the skin color** 4 chain 2 4 single_crochet in 2nd from hook 2 *1 single_crochet increase * around 6 3 4 work even 6 **change to shirt color at end of this row* 5 work even 6 6 *2 single_crochet increase * around 8 7 work even 8 *stuff hand at this point you may need to use a pencil eraser end to get the stuffing into the hand** 8 work even 8 15 *bind off leaving a long tail to sew the arm to the body stuff firmly sew arms to body at shoulder height page 5 of 10 copyright sherri bush ~
